titleSection.name: VersionOne Integration for JIRA
titleSection.shortDescription: Triage defects and include them in the planning process to balance new work and maintenance.

descriptionSection.description: VersionOne Integration for JIRA creates defects in VersionOne based on issues in JIRA. Using this integration your organization can manage and triage issues reported by customers and promote them to VersionOne once you determine a fix is necessary.

updates.releaseNotes:
* Added: Support for JIRA 5.1. 
 * Added: Logging ServiceHost Diagnostics on startup. 
 * Added: Logging VersionOne Connection Diagnostics on startup.

* Fixed: reopen scenario so reopening JIRA Issues creates new VersionOne workitems with link to previous item 
 * Fixed: problem with selecting custom VersionOne field for reference 
 * Fixed: exceptions thrown when there are no project mappings

* Fixed: reopen scenario so reopening JIRA Issues creates new VersionOne workitems with link to previous item 
 * Fixed: problem with selecting custom VersionOne field for reference 
 * Fixed: exceptions thrown when there are no project mappingsFixed: exceptions thrown when there are no project mappings

* Fixed: Null Reference Exception for Closed VersionOne Asset 
 * Fixed: Required JIRA Administrator privileges to pass validation on start-up

* Added: Support for JIRA 4.4 
 * Added: Additional control over logging with log levels, log rotation, and file size limits 
 * Added: In addition to defects, the integration now creates stories in VersionOne based on issues in JIRA 
 * Removed: Artificial distinction between tagged and assigned approaches

* Added: Support for connecting to VersionOne through a proxy. 
 * Added: Configuration Utility contains help on the various configuration options to enable quicker setup and configuration. 
 * Added: Configuration Utility supports a minimum poll interval of one minute for testing. It is not recommended that poll intervals remain this low in a production instance. 
 * Update: Source code project was dependent on .NET 3.5. Now source code project depends on the latest .NET SDK. 
 * Updated: Integration depends on Log4Net 
 * Updated: Poll time interval defaults to 30 minutes 
 * Fixed: Configuration Utility allows editing of the VersionOne credential fields when Windows Integrated Authentication is enabled. This enables configuring the integrations to connect to VersionOne as a user other than the local service account when the VersionOne instance is configured for Windows integrated authentication.
Added support for mapping projects and priority values

* Added GUI Tool for configuration 
 * Updated Documentation

* Fixed: Issue when Integration and VersionOne are in different timezones 
 * Fixed: Issue when Jira description contained a CRLF. 
 * Removed dependency on the older APIClient library.  Integration now depends on APIClient library from SDK 
 * Integration uses the APIClient library that ships with the SDK 
 * Added support for Jira 3.13.4-#354

seed.shortDescription: The initial idea of a product. May not be stable code.

sapling.shortDescription: The product is undergoing rapid growth. The code works but expect major changes.

mature.shortDescription: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.
